messages.message:
@Rakesh sorry forgot to add that detail. Logs also show a successful creation of the sample project. No errors.
@Lee One follow-up, what is the current state of the sample project? Are you able to view it on the UI?
Hey @Vasu I deleted the half completed project. Is there a way to get it to generate again without signing up for a new account?

You can make a direct API call as I did, since we don't have access to Bearer Tokens for our environment the way to make a call would be kind of a workaround. If you need the sample-project to be created, I can walk you through steps.

there’s no way for the frontend to know that there’s a job in the middle of processing files for the new sample project though, right? @Aayush

there’s no API for getting in-progress digitization / indexing / classification jobs for a project
`/projects/${projectId}/digitization/status` should give the digitization status for a project. I think this also includes the classification in case of Build project
ah i see, thanks! i looked at the backend, and it seems only Reader jobs are tracked in the project job db table
i’ll start a new thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05EQQJGN7L/p1692211259976839) about tracking the job status for other jobs associated with build projects
